pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Descriptionprodiapy is an unofficial lightweight Python package for Prodia Stable Diffusion API# Installation ```commandlinepip install -U prodiapy```# text2img example```pythonfrom prodiapy import Prodiaprodia = Prodia( api_key="YOUR_PRODIA_KEY")job = prodia.sd.generate(prompt="cat")result = prodia.wait(job)print(result.image_url)```# ContactJoin our discord to get help with package - https://discord.gg/7NbzdD6qg8
